attributes.title: This app is FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for a reliable news source, but all I got were lies and scams.... from a CORN STALK!! Not only is this burnt pork chop canceled, but he should be six feet under, too!
I used this app and lost all of my limbs. I can never hug my kids again, remove this app immediately to save other lives

attributes.title: Why are you president
attributes.review: The app made my penis not function correctly and now I think it is broken

attributes.title: Broken
attributes.review: This app doesn’t function well at all. Not to different than his administration.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: At first my phone was all perfect and not glitchy, but then I downloaded it and it made my phone so sos glitchy 😡😡

attributes.title: don’t DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: If i could give it zero stars, I would ! 🤦🏽‍♀️ it’s a terrible app. I randomly get spam TOO way notifications! It started asking unnecessary disturbing questions 🤧😡 PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP!

attributes.title: DON'T GET IT!
attributes.review: As an American, I am embarrassed by this app. I downloaded it to see what the clown for President wanted to say, but when I opened the app? My phone went berserk! I will NOT be recommending this to NO ONE!

attributes.title: Horrible trash terrible app
attributes.review: Ummm I don’t know what to say about this app it’s just a bad app in general like I could care less about this Cheeto orange man but u know it’s trash ok bye now 🍊🍊

attributes.title: Not Credible
attributes.review: It is good to get the perspective of both sides. But the hateful and childish content is distracting from whatever the actual message is. Disappointed in this app.

attributes.title: 😔✨unsatisfied 🌷🪐
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with daddy Trump💅 but the app glitched and a fat pig 🐷 kept showing up😔 only to find out its unfortunately daddy trump🤣 0/10 do NOT purchase🥰✨
